name: Seasons (Alomora)
description:
Seasons

Seasons is a 2D interactive project inspired by Wabi-sabi, an ancient Japanese aesthetic concept.

Instructions:

Left mouse button - change season.

Attributions:

Winter sounds:

  • All ambient sounds from Zapsplat

Spring sounds:

  • Forest ambiance by GirlWithSoundRecorder
  • Wind and crickets ambiance by Leandros.Ntounis

Summer sounds:

  • Wind chimes by CyrileneRossouw

Autumn sounds:

  • Wind and dry leaves ambiance by Stek59
